```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
countries_of_the_world
country_happy_test<- merge(X2018,countries_of_the_world)
country_happy_test2 <- merge(country_happy_test, percievedcorruptionwithUS)
happy_country_test <- country_happy_test2 %>%
  na.omit()
library(stringr)
names(happy_country_test)<-str_replace_all(names(happy_country_test), c(" " = "." , "," = "" ))
names(happy_country_test)<-str_replace_all(names(happy_country_test), c("%" = "", "\\("="", "\\)"="", "\\."="", "\\$"="_", "/"="by"))


happy_country_test <- subset(happy_country_test, select = -c(Score, Generosity)


class(happy_country_test$Phonesper1000)

happy_country_test<-happy_country_test%>%
  mutate(Phonesper1000=as.numeric(str_replace_all(Phonesper1000, ",", ".")))
class(happy_country_test$Phonesper1000)

happy_country_test<-happy_country_test%>%
  mutate(PopDensitypersqmi=as.numeric(str_replace_all(PopDensitypersqmi, ",", ".")))
class(happy_country_test$PopDensitypersqmi)

happy_country_test<-happy_country_test%>%
  mutate(Coastlinecoastbyarearatio=as.numeric(str_replace_all(Coastlinecoastbyarearatio, ",", ".")))
class(happy_country_test$Coastlinecoastbyarearatio)

happy_country_test<-happy_country_test%>%
  mutate(Netmigration=as.numeric(str_replace_all(Netmigration, ",", ".")))
class(happy_country_test$Netmigration)

happy_country_test<-happy_country_test%>%
  mutate(Arable=as.numeric(str_replace_all(Arable, ",", ".")))
class(happy_country_test$Arable)

happy_country_test<-happy_country_test%>%
  mutate(Crops=as.numeric(str_replace_all(Crops, ",", ".")))
class(happy_country_test$Crops)

happy_country_test<-happy_country_test%>%
  mutate(Agriculture=as.numeric(str_replace_all(Agriculture, ",", ".")))
class(happy_country_test$Agriculture)

happy_country_test<-happy_country_test%>%
  mutate(Industry=as.numeric(str_replace_all(Industry, ",", ".")))
class(happy_country_test$Industry)

happy_country_test<-happy_country_test%>%
  mutate(Service=as.numeric(str_replace_all(Service, ",", ".")))
class(happy_country_test$Service)```
